name: Fitness Simulator
description:
Perform fitness

The most authentic fitness simulation puts you in the shoes of a rookie who wants to fight his way up the fitness olymp. Perform fitness, get sponsored and become the fittest person in the universe. With real exercise fottage and real challenge.

How would it feel to be a professional fitness performer? Glory on the victorious and shame on the loser. Risking it all for the best performance. See for yourself how to get real in this authentic fitness simulator.

Do you have what it takes to master fitness?

features
  • hip hop soundtrack
  • different challenging exercises
  • Get money for fitness items
  • live action fitness footage
  • get injured performing fitness
